data.name: Radical Relocation
data.detailed_description:
You're moving house! Move your belongings to your new home in Radical Relocation by precariously balancing them on the roof of your car in this extremely challenging physics based puzzle!



Based on the original Ludum Dare 40 game, Radical Relocation has a challenging take on on the theme, "the more you have, the worse it is"! You are moving house! Carry your luggage on the roof of your car as you embark on your journey! But beware, if you drop or break something, you lose!

Features:
  • Challenging physics based gameplay
  • Many levels to keep you frustrated!
  • Beautiful, relaxing low poly environment
  • Potential for expansion and development with new vehicles and maps



Strategically stack your luggage on the roof of your car like 3d tetris! Be careful! Some items are prone to falling.



Follow your map to the new house. Maybe take it slow around the corners though! If anything falls off, you lose! Use trailers to help with large loads but be careful where you drive - reversing is difficult! And watch out for trains, they may take you by surprise!



Use utmost caution while driving! If your luggage falls off, you lose! To win, you must arrive at your destination with all your belongings intact!



Radical Relocation evolves based on your feedback. Report bugs in game using the Bug Reporter, or join us in our discord server!

data.short_description: You're moving house! Move your belongings to your new home by precariously balancing it on the roof of your car in this extremely challenging physics based puzzle!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 600 Series or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 700 Series or Equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: i3 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: i5 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
